text: Hopea hainanensis is a species of tree in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Hainan Island of China and northern Vietnam. ==References== hainanensis Category:Trees of China Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Flora of Hainan Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Elmer Drew Merrill
title: Hopea hainanensis
